# GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/accessibilityDeclarations | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/accessibilityDeclarations ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-accessibilityDeclarations)

-  GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/accessibilityDeclarations 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/accessibilityDeclarations

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-accessibilityDeclarations#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/apps/{id}/relationships/accessibilityDeclarations
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-accessibilityDeclarations#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-accessibilityDeclarations#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200`## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-accessibilityDeclarations#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[AppAccessibilityDeclarationsLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/appaccessibilitydeclarationslinkagesresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-accessibilityDeclarations#see-also)

### [Getting accessibility declaration information](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-accessibilityDeclarations#Getting-accessibility-declaration-information)

[`List all accessibility declarations for an app`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-accessibilitydeclarations)Get a list of the accessibility declarations for a specific app.
